由⑴知$b_{n}=3n+2^{n-1}(n=1,2,\cdots)$$b_{n}=3n+2^{n-1}(n=1,2,\cdots)$． 数列$\left\lbrace3n\right\rbrace$的前n项和为$\frac{3}{2}n(n=1)+2^{n}-1$，数列$\left\lbrace2^{n-1}\right\rbrace$的前n项和为$1\times\frac{1-2^{n}}{1-2}=2^{n}-1$ ． 所以，数列$\left\lbraceb_{n}\right\rbrace$的前n项和为$\frac{3}{2}n(n+1)+2^{n}-1$．
